FreeSurfer Primer

Made for CFMI Training

Importing Raw Data At the CFMI, the original .IMA DICOM files are usually downloaded or copied from the raw data directory on the server and converted to nifti (.nii) or analyze (.img/.hdr) format. A program for performing automatic conversion and data duplication can be found in the dicom-tools repo.

This package contains the fetch-dicom program, a wrapper around the dcm2niix conversion software. Software such as MRICONVERT or MRICRON may also be used for this purpose. An example call of fetch-dicom appears below,

FreeSurfer Primer maintained by cfmilab
